response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value surpasses $800,000. Considering its rarity and the benefits it offers, we kindly propose a special introductory offer of $950,000. We are confident this investment will yield significant returns and meet your highest standards. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this extraordinary piece into your collection.", "product_price": 950000}
